execution_plan.description: Find IDs of goods that are apple-flavored pies.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE flavor = 'apple' AND food = 'pie';

execution_plan.description: Find distinct receipt numbers that include any of the goods identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve receipts that either have a ReceiptNumber found in step 2 (i.e., bought an apple-flavor pie) or have CustomerId = 12.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, Date, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt) OR CustomerId = 12;
